= Introduction =

We'll use xml
compass information is in degrees

flex information is based on voltage information

flex 1:

653 standing up

<570 means something bad happening

<500 EMERGENCY

<450 OMG WTF we're dead

flex 2:

603 standing up

<530 something bad happening

<450 EMERGENCY

<400 OMG WTF we're dead 


ultrasonic is in inches
